channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SWARM-352] Ribbon example fails to start
item.description:
I am also facing the parsing error when I try to run ribbon example manually (https://github.com/wildfly-swarm/wildfly-swarm-examples/tree/master/ribbon).

I also did rm -rf ~/.m2/repository/org/jboss and then I started the frontend using mvn wildfly-swarm:run and after then I run into parsing error when tried to run time service using mvn -Dswarm.port.offset=1 wildfly-swarm:run.

$ mvn -Dswarm.port.offset=2 wildfly-swarm:run
 
[INFO] Scanning for projects...

[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Lukas Vlcek, I tried replicating on my Mac and was unable to recreate it.

I removed all M2 REPO contents under org/jboss, ran the ribbon front end, and ran the time service with port offset.

They all started without error, after downloading the required jars.

I'm not sure what to suggest to make progress on this

Ken Finnigan that is interesting...
I can try to wipe out whole local m2 repo and see if this helps ....
BTW, is there any CI? If yes and it passes (given the CI job runs maven too) then it for sure is issue on my side.

https://projectodd.ci.cloudbees.com/view/WildFly%20Swarm/job/wildfly-swarm-examples/ is the CI for the -examples repo.

Let me know how that goes, otherwise I'm not sure what the issue is
Closing as I'm unable to replicate after making some fixes to Ribbon in -examples
Works for me as well now. Thanks.
